an5.146:4.1: “Mendicants, you shouldn’t associate with a mendicant friend who has five qualities.
an5.146:4.3: They start up work projects. They take up disciplinary issues. They conflict with leading mendicants. They like long and aimless wandering. They’re unable to educate, encourage, fire up, and inspire you from time to time with a Dharma talk.
an5.146:4.4: Mendicants, you shouldn’t associate with a mendicant friend who has these five qualities.
an5.146:5.1: You should associate with a mendicant friend who has five qualities.
an5.146:5.3: They don’t start up work projects. They don’t take up disciplinary issues. They don’t conflict with leading mendicants. They don’t like long and aimless wandering. They’re able to educate, encourage, fire up, and inspire you from time to time with a Dharma talk.
an5.146:5.4: You should associate with a mendicant friend who has these five qualities.”
